subject: CNN Breaking News
body:
-- Sources: U.S. Rep. William Jefferson, D-Louisiana, indicted on more than a dozen charges related to corruption.

Watch the latest video now on CNN.com. Access at http://CNN.com. CNN - The most trusted name in news.

The CNN Presidential Debates: Tomorrow at 7 p.m. ET, the
Republicans debate and for the first time take questions from the
voters.  Immediately after the debate, join the best political
team on television live for "Raw Politics."
http://www.CNN.com/elections
